spells.name: Energy Siege Shot
spells.description: A Large siege engine deals energy damage that you designate with other effects depending on the type of energy you choose.

spells.name: Life Conduit, Greater
spells.description: You transfer 3d6 hit points to your eidolon as a swift action.

spells.name: Tar Pool
spells.description: Converts the top layer of the ground into hot tar.

spells.name: Wreath of Blades
spells.description: Four mithral daggers speed around you, attacking nearby creatures and protecting your spellcasting from attacks of opportunity.
